QuestData.Title: Behind Closed Doors
QuestData.Description: You've discovered the location of Khan Shodo's daughter, Kherrah. She is being held behind the doors to Maraudon!$b$bThe rescue attempt is certain to be risky, but if you seek the Gelkis clan's cooperation, you must free the Khan's daughter.
QuestData.LogDescription: You are to find Kherrah somewhere behind the doors to Maraudon.
QuestData.RewardText: Is it safe for me to leave, $r?
